body_html: It seems like one of these tests is not safe on the GPU. I think there is a bug with broadcast_to on GPU from scalars; can you make that test cpu-only by adding a with ops.device("cpu:0"): block around it?
body_text: It seems like one of these tests is not safe on the GPU. I think there is a bug with broadcast_to on GPU from scalars; can you make that test cpu-only by adding a with ops.device("cpu:0"): block around it?
body: It seems like one of these tests is not safe on the GPU. I think there is a bug with broadcast_to on GPU from scalars; can you make that test cpu-only by adding a `with ops.device("cpu:0"):` block around it?
